forensic.name: Where is My Secert
forensic.desc:
easy forensics

Chafroun is hiding something from me, the only hint he gave me that its in an artifact. He refused to elaborate more 😦 Can you help me reach his secret??

Author: Raf²

rev.name: 4thTemple
rev.desc:
Terry Davis got some secret CIA hidden game known as 4thTemple, can you reveal the secret? RIP Terry Davis...

The secret follows the regex: [0-9A-F] Wrap what you find with Securinets{}.

Download Secret TempleOS image: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1wokKg0jo_OcR8WE3Aej7gwfOLl0hlTCi/view?usp=sharing

    Author: Iyed

rev.name: Exodia
rev.desc:
Our game development team has experienced a security breach, and unfortunately, the hackers managed to compromise the game while it's still in its BETA phase. We believe they may have tampered with various aspects of the game, so please be aware that you might encounter several bugs. If you'd like to assist the development team, we encourage you to document any issues you come across and submit them after the CTF concludes. Your help is greatly appreciated!

Author : Ir0nbyte / Twitter
